content:
With the help of a drone, the expensive Murom long-range videothermal imaging surveillance system was destroyed.

About thisreported March 18Commander of the National Guard of Ukraine Oleksandr Pivnenko.

According to him, the enemy complex was discovered by aerial reconnaissance of the 11th brigade named after Mykhailo Hrushevskyi.

ЯкThe ArmyInform reported earlier, Ukrainian snipers shot 6 Russians.
title: Defense forces were eliminated by the "wall"
description: This was reported on March 18 by the commander of the National Guard of Ukraine Oleksandr Pivnenko. By...
author: Army Inform
